creator: Tapps Games - PT
descriptionHtml:
Boo, the greatest virtual pet game, is back in 3D! Get ready to go on adventures, play mini games, and of course, care for your best friend, Boo, with all new foods, clothes, toys and more!

Each Boo is like a real pet that needs lots of attention, and your task is to take care of it in the best way possible. Feed it, wash it, make sure it gets enough rest so you can play with all sorts of games together!

However, this time, you get to care for Boo's world too! Explore different maps to discover new games, upgrade and decorate the town, meet characters and send gifts. That way, your friends can send you gifts back and help you decorate your world even better!

Everyone thinks they have the cutest Boo, and none of them are wrong! All Boo's are the cutest!

You'll be able to customize your Boo the way you like. Change your Boo's hair and clothes. Put costumes on your Boo and let him look like your favorite character from TV or cinema. Your Boo will be the cutest virtual pet ever!


Your Boo will get hungry, and for him to grow, feed your virtual pet with lots of delicious foods, like potatoes, cakes, pizzas, fruits, vegetables, and much more! NEW FEATURE: Throw the Boo food in your virtual pet mouth, but if you make a mistake, you'll have to give a bath in your Boo!

HIGHLIGHTS
All game is about to take care of your virtual pet, Boo is like a real pet, so you'll have to
ADOPT a virtual pet, give it a special name, and take care of your Boo!
DRESS your Boo with countless outfits to let your virtual pet the way you want, the cutest Boo int the world!
FEED your virtual pet with pizza, potatoes, fruits, vegetables, make your Boo chubby and cute!
MINI GAMES - play a lot of games with your Boo, earn coins, and achieve high levels to unlock different clothes and lots of games!
BOO's HOUSE, decorate your 3D virtual pet house the way you want!
CLEAN your Boo up, give a bath in your virtual pet to keep it clean and happy, no one likes to be dirty, isn't it?
CARE, give your Boo some medicines, and make your virtual pet sleep well, to recharge the Boo energies, and restart the play!

Boo is like potato chips! It's hard to have just one! Because of that, you can have lots of Boos and customize them in different ways! Enjoy the Boo community and share your Boo style, for your friends see how cute your Boo are!


Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionShort: The cutest virtual pet is back! Explore a brand new world with a ton of games!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Big News everyone!

⭐ Customize your Boo!
You can change your color, add patterns, glasses, hats, tails, wings, thers already more than 60 options!

⭐ A New Minigame!

⭐ Lots of Improvements and Bug Fixes!

📋Let us know what you think!
This is an early version of the game, so make sure to give us your feedback! What else do you want to see in Boo 2?

title: My Boo 2: Fun Virtual Pet Games in a Pocket World

creator: Tapps Games - PT
descriptionHtml:
Meet Boo, your newest virtual pet! Take good care of your Boo each day to win prizes and enjoy countless hours of fun games!

What is a Boo, you ask?

Each Boo is like a real pet that needs your attention and care. Your goal is to feed it, pet it, wash it, and keep Boo healthy and happy so you can play fun games together!

Speaking of fun games, My Boo 2 has an arcade full of 3d games to play, and the collection is growing with each update! Earn coins, challenge other boos, and rank up your games to unlock special prizes and outfits!

Use your coins to unlock decorations, upgrades to your pocket world, and tons of outfits to dress up Boo. Boo is your virtual pet, so you can transform it into anything you want! You can get skins, patterns, hats, hairstyles, accessories, wings, and more! Mix and match to create any style! As you level up, you will unlock even more accessories and outfits.

Features

VIRTUAL PET CARE

Boo will react to show you what it is feeling, and it is up to you to make sure your best buddy is happy and full of energy! It will be up to you to take good care of your virtual pet with relaxing games.

PLAY FUN GAMES

My Boo 2 has the best virtual pet games! The best part is there are a ton of relaxing games to play, from puzzle to action, play tons of 3d games with your friends! As you earn points and new high scores, you can rank up each minigame to unlock secret outfits for your Boo!

DRESS UP

Dress up your Boo with countless outfits and combinations! Use your fashion sense to dress up Boo with style, or go crazy and dress up Boo into an adorable cat, a fierce dragon, or even a cute strawberry!

CLEAN UP

Boo can make quite a mess, and it will be up to you to clean this pocket world! Dust off the furniture and clean up the pou to win coins and rewards!

EXPLORE THE WORLD

Take boo outside and meet other Boos! Talk to them for quests so you can help make their boo town the best ever! Explore the 3d world to find fun pet games to play together!

DAILY REWARDS

Win exciting rewards each day by filing up the Fun Bar! Earn fun by playing with Boo, satisfying Boo's adorable cravings, cleaning up pou, and much more.

We've got a long list of adorable features and new cute games planned, so keep an eye out for updates. Each month we will add more virtual pet games, food, decorations, and more!

Let us know what features or new fun games you think we should add!

DRESS UP

Dress up your Boo with countless outfits and combinations! Use your fashion sense to dress up Boo with style, or go crazy and dress up Boo into an adorable cat, a fierce dragon, or even a cute strawberry!

CLEAN UP

Boo can make quite a mess, and it will be up to you to clean this pocket world! Dust off the furniture and clean up the pou to win coins and rewards!

EXPLORE THE WORLD

Take boo outside and meet other Boos! Talk to them for quests so you can help make their boo town the best ever! Explore the 3d world to find fun pet games to play together!

DAILY REWARDS

Win exciting rewards each day by filing up the Fun Bar! Earn fun by playing with Boo, satisfying Boo's adorable cravings, cleaning up pou, and much more.

We've got a long list of adorable features and new cute games planned, so keep an eye out for updates. Each month we will add more virtual pet games, food, decorations, and more!

Let us know what features or new fun games you think we should add!
descriptionShort: Have fun games with your friend, take care and customize a cute virtual pet!

Boo is back and now in 3D! Meet the cutest virtual pet to take care of and have fun. Meet his neighbors, play adventure games, and remember to take care of your virtual friend every day. Play FREE* My Boo 2 and enjoy all the fun with your pet in various adventures!

Meet the cutest pet with new features! Boo is back, and you can join the fun with adventure games, meet other Boos, and explore a world of games with your virtual friend. Enjoy the dog, cat, rabbit, and other animal skins, all to make your buddy happy. With My Boo 2, you will find a 3D world of many adventures and virtual friends for limitless fun.

Remember to take care of Boo every day. You need to bathe, feed, and play the most fun adventure games with your virtual pet. The more you play with your buddy, the more coins you earn to buy new clothes and accessories. There are multiple options for skinks, hairstyles, decorations, and more. Play every day and unlock outfits for puppies, kittens, rabbits, and other unique items.

Download My Boo 2 now and make your pet happy!

🐶 Virtual Pet Game


Boo is the best animal companion you can have fun with! There are adventure games and a great neighborhood with virtual friends. The more you interact with your pet, the happier he gets and the more coins you earn to unlock new features. Enjoy fun games with your best friend!

🐱 Animal Costumes


You can customize your Boo in many ways. There are options of clothes and skins of puppies, kittens, rabbits, and other virtual animals. Everything to make your game even more fun and your pet happy. Remember to play every day, complete the daily missions, and take care of Boo to get more items for your adventure game!

🌎 Explore the 3D Boo World


Explore a 3D world of many adventures with your buddy! Meet your neighbors and make new virtual friends. In addition to meeting other Boo species, you can complete daily quests and missions to earn rewards, unlock new areas, clothes, and items for your pet. Discover funny adventures with your virtual pet.

🕹️ Adventure Games


Besides taking care of Boo, you can play adventure games with your virtual pet. There are 24 mini-games to relax and have fun every day. The more games and missions you complete, the more rewards you earn for your 3D animal world. Take care of Boo and keep your game up to date as more new features are coming.

*My Boo 2 is a free offline virtual pet game. However, there are additional features and extra items that can be purchased through the store.
